span.span: Pass -1 to indicate that Passport should use the default value.

span.span: to have the Login server compare the iTimeWindow parameter against the time since the user last signed in; to have the Login server compare iTimeWindow against the last time the Ticket was refreshed.

span.span: Pass -1 to indicate that Passport should use the default value.

value.span: Il tempo, in secondi, trascorso dal momento in cui un membro si è connesso al server di accesso Passport.

span.span: The time, in seconds, since a member's logon to the Passport logon server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questa classe è deprecata e non è più supportata.This class has been deprecated and is no longer supported. Microsoft Passport Network è stato sostituito da Windows Live ID.Microsoft Passport Network has been replaced by Windows Live ID.
